title: Is We Dumb? | Hot Sauce. Tool. Candy Bar. Rectal Prolapse.
description:
Have you ever been so high on shrooms at a Tool concert that you believed you were a serial killer and your friend was an uncover cop trying to get you confess? Dan has. Let's talk about that, weird ass baseball superstitions, getting hair in your food, branding your initials on a liver during surgery, and more on today's episode of Is We Dumb?!

 

New episodes every Wednesday at 12pm PST

 

Watch this episode on YouTube:

 

Suggestions for segment content: dumb@iswedumb.com
